name: 2021 6th Asia Conference on Environment and Sustainable Development（ACESD 2021）
content: Papers submitted to ACESD will be reviewed by the conference committees, accepted and presented papers will be published in Springer Book Series Environmental Science and Engineering (ISSN: 1863-5520), which will be indexed by EI Compendex, Scopus, CPCI and the other major databases. Selected papers with extention will be published into the International Journal of Environmental Science and Development as a special issue, which will be indexed by Scopus (Since 2019), Chemical Abstracts Services (CAS), CABI, DOAJ, Ulrich Periodicals Directory, Crossref, ProQuest, etc.
